name: Doctor Heal
description:
In this game, you will have to complete requests and level up your medical equipment to get more request with more reward.

There are also different types of request:

(Level 1) Depression, Sore Throat, Headache, (Level 2) Back Pain, Short Sighted, Broken Arm, Burnt Leg, (Level 3) Color Blindness, (Level 4) Lung Disease, Blindness, (Level 5) Heart Attack, Unknown Heart Disease and even (Level 6) Cancer!

The reward and bonus will be increased which base on the level of requirement of the request!

Your goal in this game is to cure cancer.

Good Luck.
